message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed-to-soft session in mid/small caps with PSU/infra consolidating. Our holdings mostly hovered near support and did not trigger invalidations. Cash is limited, so we will stick to strength-only entries and defer actions to Monday unless a true emergency stop is breached. No emergency trades today.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "signal": "Momentum buy", "reason": "Decisive close above 161.4 trigger; look to buy Monday on retest >161.5 with risk ~159.5; room to 165/169 if breadth supportive", "price": 162.71},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Add on breakout", "reason": "Coiling above 112.5; momentum only on push >118.9–119; manage risk under ~111.5", "price": 113.21},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Breakout buy on strength", "reason": "Tight coil near support; clean trigger >329.9–330 opens 338/345; risk reference 307/311", "price": 311.65},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Continuation buy", "reason": "Holding the 302 base; next leg only if >314–316; risk 297/291; avoid adds if <305", "price": 302.8},
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Add on strength", "reason": "Structure intact above ~103.8; add only on decisive >109.6/110 reclaim; risk 103.8", "price": 105.35},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Continuation buy", "reason": "Trend resumes on a push through 360–361; risk ~346", "price": 350.0},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Breakout follow-through", "reason": "Higher-low intact; add only on >1040/1050; invalidation below ~1004", "price": 1016.5},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Breakout continuation", "reason": "Sustain >340 to extend; good volume leadership in metals; risk 325/312; avoid if slips <332", "price": 339.2},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Strength-only buy", "reason": "Momentum improves above 418 with extension past 432; risk ~403/396", "price": 403.95},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Reclaim/momentum buy", "reason": "Reclaim >1600 improves stability; real momentum above 1665–1670; cut if <1525", "price": 1550.5},
    {"symbol": "JUBLFOOD", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Reversal trigger lies at >612/619; risk ~580; avoid until reclaimed", "price": 589.2},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Psychological breakout above 100/100.3 can accelerate; risk ~96.5", "price": 97.65}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 868.95,
    "total_value": 26416.85,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "GMRAIRPORT: 40 units @ 108.40 (CMP 105.35)",
      "LTF: 20 units @ 311.20 (CMP 302.80)",
      "RVNL: 20 units @ 324.10 (CMP 311.65)",
      "ABCAPITAL: 10 units @ 357.60 (CMP 350.00)",
      "NBCC: 40 units @ 116.65 (CMP 113.21)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 1 units @ 1031.35 (CMP 1016.50)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Holdings risk lines (emergency only if decisively broken): GMRAIRPORT <103.8; LTF <297 (hard) / <291 (absolute); RVNL sustained <309–311; ABCAPITAL <346; NBCC <111.5; LAURUSLABS <1004. None triggered today.",
    "PSU rail/infra: RVNL and NBCC consolidating; wait for RVNL >330 and NBCC >118.9 for adds. IRCON steady; momentum only >165.",
    "Autos: ASHOKLEY closed above 161.4 trigger; prefer small, strength-only buys on Monday if >161.5 holds. ESCORTS needs >3830 to improve.",
    "Pharma: LAURUSLABS constructive above 1004; adds only >1040/1050. WOCKPHARMA extended—avoid chasing. BIOCON firm; momentum improves if >412.5.",
    "Banks/NBFC: LTF building base above 302; continuation needs >314–316. AUBANK healthy above ~938–953 zone; UNIONBANK range-bound; INDIANB cooling—wait for stability.",
    "Capital goods/Defence: BEL watch >418/432; BHEL weak below 287–292—wait for reclaim >287. HAL trend intact; buy-on-dips only.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE slipped to 2751 support; better only >2849; CDSL needs reclaim >1600 then >1665–1670 for momentum.",
    "Power/Renewables: NTPCGREEN stuck 91.7–95.5; confirmation only >95.5. INOXWIND choppy—strength-only >134.5. KPIGREEN looks strong if >450.",
    "Metals: HINDCOPPER leadership if it sustains >340; SAIL capped below 135/145 band—avoid until breakout. NAVA constructive >530.",
    "Discretionary/FMCG: JUBLFOOD reversal only >612/619; VBL steady; VOLTAS near trend support, needs >1350 reclaim.",
    "IT/Services: KPITTECH constructive—momentum >1267–1275; COFORGE/MPHASIS firm but prefer strength-only entries given cash constraints.",
    "Realty/Hospitals: PRESTIGE needs >1660 for momentum; OBEROIRLTY constructive above 1640; MAXHEALTH/NH firm with buy-on-dips bias.",
    "Execution: No trades until Monday unless an emergency stop is breached with authority (gap-and-go below invalidation with volume). With limited cash, take only top strength triggers and keep sizes small with tight stops."
  ]
}
